items.title: Tokenization Up 33%, Click to Pay Doubled: Is Mastercard a Buy Now?
items.description: MA's tokenized transactions surged over one-third in Europe, boosting its footprint in the payments ecosystem, but rising costs and regulatory risks cloud its high valuation.

items.title: Visa and Klarna Launch Innovative Card With Hybrid Features
items.description: V teams up with Klarna to launch a hybrid debit card that offers Pay Now, Pay in 4 and Pay Later options.

items.title: Update: Market Chatter: EU Regulators Push for More Transparency in Visa, Mastercard Fees
items.description: (Updates with Mastercard's response in the fifth paragraph) European Union antitrust authorities

items.title: Market Chatter: EU Regulators Push for More Transparency in Visa, Mastercard Fees
items.description: European Union antitrust authorities are intensifying their probe into Visa (V) and Mastercard (MA),
